articles.description: Jared Bednar has a tough decision to make. Does he break up his top line, splitting Nathan MacKinnon and Mikko Rantanen before frustration sets in against Seattle?
articles.content:
One lousy game into the NHL playoffs, being the defending champion means zilch, and Avalanche coach Jared Bednar has a tough decision to make.
Does Bednar break up his top line, splitting Nathan Mac… [+4274 chars]

articles.title: Orioles might activate Kyle Bradish to start tonight - Camden Chat
articles.description: A win without offense, a bullpen shake-up, and going for the sweep in D.C.
articles.content:
